mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.issue_title AS "issueTitle", a.issue_content AS "issueContent", a.issue_status AS "issueStatus", a.popularity AS "popularity", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_issue( id, issue_title, issue_content, issue_status, popularity, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{issueTitle}, #{issueContent}, 0, #{popularity}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_issue SET issue_title = #{issueTitle}, issue_content = #{issueContent}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
